user_instruction: 'Send Mark an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position. You can check out my Notion for information. Mark'"'"'s email is mark.johnson@techcorp.com.'

formatted_items.content:
To: Jane Smith  
Subject: Request for Update on Engineering Team Candidates

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an updated overview of the current candidates for our open engineering-team position? If it’s easiest, you can pull the latest details from your Notion workspace.

When you have a moment, would you mind including:
• Candidate names and roles  
• Current hiring stage for each candidate  
• Upcoming interview dates (if any)  
• Any relevant notes or concerns  

Please forward the update to me at mark.johnson@techcorp.com whenever you can.

Thanks very much for your help!

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:

• Any relevant notes or concerns  

Please forward the update to me at mark.johnson@techcorp.com whenever you can.

Thanks very much for your help!

Best regards,
